topic.title: Lottery Winning Approach, Powerball, Lotto America, Lucky for Life, Lotto Max …
topic.body:
[Lottery Winning Approach, Powerball, Lotto America, Lucky for Life, Lotto Max … ](http://127.0.0.1:43110/168x9d56MSBjrq6TYoDaSvxXSux3nPzw37/?Topic:1_1MLMJkrjAE8msexWjjjTnQPcSAZvoCanSJ/Lottery+Winning+Approach+Powerball+Lotto+America+Lucky+for+Life+Lotto+Max)

... 

With the flooding of Coronavirus, many industries encounter extreme difficulties.  The lottery industry still seems to keep some vitality at unusual stage of history.  
**Those data may be helpful for some people who are sensitive to digits and numbers. **

1599727900_1MLMJkrjAE8msexWjjjTnQPcSAZvo.body:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=NHM85AFXz1w 
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=EcnmFYonZx4 
Some Youtube videos have no content, just using the keywords Lottery Winning, and it attracts large volume of visitors. 
So by posting some substantial in-depth analysis on Lottery Digits composition, it’d help attract more people to use Zeronet. 

Those data are processed by an associate David, who often uses Regular Expression on EditPlus software, plus Excel Visual Basic programming to process large volume of social events data.  One day, he suddenly found that the huge volume of Lottery Digits combinations can be processed by similar approaches.  
These approaches though don’t guarantee Jackpot prediction, they can indeed help reduce the errors.  

By computer-aided analysis of data, sensitivity to digits will be enhanced, then many digit combinations with disharmony against the rhythm of digit composition can be filtered, thus reduce the errors.

The file can be downloaded via Zero Up Unlimited 
http://127.0.0.1:43110/1CiXRY9ATZSoZqBzwMfXEMsKtPRt2aQoF2/ 
See if it can be downloaded smoothly ?

The peers may increase a little later. 
Another file is launched, with the latest Sep. 09th draw included. 
Lottery Winning Approach Powerball 200909.pdf 
http://127.0.0.1:43110/1CiXRY9ATZSoZqBzwMfXEMsKtPRt2aQoF2/data/users/1MLMJkrjAE8msexWjjjTnQPcSAZvoCanSJ/Lottery%20Winning%20Approach%20Powerball%20200909.pdf 
This one can be used more conveniently, either for analysis by yourself, or promotion of the decentralized web of Zeronet.

> [morocco](#comment_2_1K58h2FWDHY6khgbecX1UqFXh2vgGkMKXq): Zeroup showing 0 peer

Some errors are modified with the column "Sum of One's Digit". 
Another version, update 2 will be better ... 
http://127.0.0.1:43110/1CiXRY9ATZSoZqBzwMfXEMsKtPRt2aQoF2/data/users/1MLMJkrjAE8msexWjjjTnQPcSAZvoCanSJ/Lottery%20Winning%20Approach%20Powerball%20200909%20Update%202.pdf

Certainly, that is a right mentality. Not to play, means no errors, no risks, and no losses. 
No error, no risk or no loss is itself a good way of life for some people. 
Yet there’re always quite many people who like to take the risks. 
That’s why a simple Youtube video without significant content can attract millions of visitors. 
So those data-analysis approaches may be helpful for some people, at least for them to reduce errors.  

In fact, some netizens use those unconventional approaches to enhance their sensitivity on numbers.  They may win some small prizes occasionally.  To win the jackpot seems to be of very minuscule odds of chance. If bigger prizes such as second prize are won by someone using the special approaches, the event will itself be a good thing to spread the influence of the decentralized network of Zeronet. 

If one wants to play, the best philosophy is to play as little as possible, and learn to observe the unlimited infinity of changing combinations as much as possible.  

The data-handling work is also taken as an exercise of the Regular Expression formulas and other computer skills.

See if the file can be downloaded smoothly?

The other site (File Upload site 1), maybe just due to a peculiar post related to some tools against GFW, then suddenly some unexpected problems were encountered …
